'''"Pure Gorgeous Summer"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Pure Gorgeous Summer" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

This item's blueprint was temporarily obtainable from the [[Midsummer Island Adventure]] event shop in [[Version 1.6]], and was permanently added to the Realm Depot stock in [[Version 2.1]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
